idx_email_links_client.name: idx_email_links_client
idx_email_links_client.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND client_id IS NOT NULL)

idx_email_links_project.name: idx_email_links_project
idx_email_links_project.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND project_id IS NOT NULL)

Users view linked emails for accessible.name: Users view linked emails for accessible clients

email_links_client_or_project.name: email_links_client_or_project
email_links_client_or_project.value: client_id IS NOT NULL OR project_id IS NOT NULL

email_links_confidence_range.name: email_links_confidence_range
email_links_confidence_range.value: confidence IS NULL OR (confidence >= 0 AND confidence <= 1)

idx_email_metadata_thread.name: idx_email_metadata_thread
idx_email_metadata_thread.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND gmail_thread_id IS NOT NULL)

projects_type_client_check.name: projects_type_client_check
projects_type_client_check.value:
(
        (type = 'CLIENT' AND client_id IS NOT NULL)
        OR (
          type IN ('PERSONAL', 'INTERNAL')
          AND client_id IS NULL
        )
      )

idx_task_suggestions_project.name: idx_task_suggestions_project
idx_task_suggestions_project.where: (deleted_at IS NULL AND project_id IS NOT NULL)

Users view own task suggestions.name: Users view own task suggestions

public.current_user_with_role.definition: SELECT id, role FROM users u WHERE id = auth.uid() AND deleted_at IS NULL
public.current_user_with_role.name: current_user_with_role
